# {%= name %} {%= badge("fury") %}
> {%= description %}

## Install
{%= include("install") %}

## Run tests

```bash
npm test
```

## Usage

```js
var mixin = require('{%= name %}');

var obj = {c: 'c'};
var foo = mixin({a: 'a'}, {b: 'b'});
console.log(foo);
//=> {c: 'c', a: 'a', b: 'b'}
console.log(obj);
//=> {c: 'c'}

mixin({}, {a: 'a'}, {b: 'b'});
//=> {a: 'a', b: 'b'}
```
